summary: Wanted to install rod 6 ways to Skyrim? We have good news for you, now you can do it like the anime naruto? Rather then install our mod, don't know where to find staff of 6 paths? We will tell you more!
descriptionHtml:
So the mod adds to the game Skyrim staff based on a manga naruto, a staff called [b]the staff of the six paths[/b], it's a weapon you'll find near the statue of Meridia see the screenshots to get the exact location of the staff, just walk up to the statues of Meridia and you will see how to receive the rod 6 ways near the hands of the statue, use the telekinesis spell to take the staff.In version 1.0 the staff will have only part of the magical energy, as it has lost its power in the last battle. Staff, magic, lightning, lightning damage to 15 units by area within a radius of 25 units.
In future versions of the mod maybe the staff strength will return and you will be able
to use different spells in the game Skyrim from the anime naruto.

[youtube]X8tZ2SHE_vk[/youtube]

To install mod download the archive and unzip the two files which are there in the Data folder with your Skyrim game, that's all for now.
author: Aksyonov

files.name: Staff six ways by Aksyonov v1.0
